entries.s_fb2eead4: Very well. Thank you for visiting the museum.
entries.s_e649bf0a: I would like to purchase a schematic of the current featured work of art.
entries.s_d9e04161: There are only a few days left before we begin looking for the next work of art for us to feature.
entries.s_d543ced9: No thank you. I'm simply wandering through.
entries.s_ce4aa2ab: I think I prefer Giaal Itottr.
entries.s_cccdca43: I hope you enjoy your visit. Feel free to look around.
entries.s_c8e54945: I'm afraid you don't have enough credits, and I must insist on the donation. Please return when you have more funds available.
entries.s_c845a58c: It would appear that you are unable to carry it. Please return after you made some space in your inventory.
entries.s_c1f9104: Where will I find Kolka Zteht?
entries.s_b9059b2b: I think I've got it. Thanks!
entries.s_aaa43f7b: Hello and welcome to the Bestine Museum.
entries.s_a9f1e0f9: Oh, it'll be more than a week before we begin the search for our next featured work of art.
entries.s_9c595e48: I hope you enjoy your visit.
entries.s_9558d37a: How long until you look for another work of art to feature?
entries.s_911a27f8: I'm ready to tell you which artist I choose.
entries.s_8ed85f40: I see, well thank you for visiting the museum.
entries.s_8b3d6e46: Can you tell me anything about Sean Trenwell?
entries.s_8338587c: The pleasure is all mine. Return after speaking to the artists. Farewell.
entries.s_82761006: Tell me where to find Vanvi Hotne.
entries.s_7c297430: Mr. Trenwell? Yes, of course. Many of our latest additions and newest programs have only been possible thanks to funding provided by the efforts of Mr. Trenwell. His large personal contributions - both in time and money - have been generous beyond expectations.
entries.s_7b488371: Indeed, I would be quite happy to do exactly that. I'll load that into this datapad that you can then take to Mrs. Aryon.
entries.s_7882a978: [Smiling] Excellent. Now, where did I leave those. Oh yes, here they are. Thank you for supporting the arts.
entries.s_7312fa13: Excellent. Once per month, I wish to feature a new work of art here at the museum. We have a fine permanent collection on display, as always, but it is my desire to enhance that collection by offering something new from time to time. To that end, we select a small number of artists and approach them with the chance of having their art featured here in Bestine.
entries.s_71561c79: Ah, of course. I remember you now. I have everything prepared and loaded onto this datapad that you can show to Mrs. Aryon.
entries.s_6dbeccc3: We'll begin the search for another featured work of art within the hour.
entries.s_6d1148d8: Would you be willing to put that in writing so I could share your opinion with the governor?
entries.s_6b5b28b2: No thank you. I'm just here to visit the museum.
entries.s_68c6c699: You'll find Klepa Laeel in Mos Espa. He's often found towards the back of the starport.
entries.s_67026fa8: Look near the back of the theater in Mos Entha to find Kolka Zteht.
entries.s_605d9185: Hello and welcome to the Bestine Museum. I hope you enjoy your visit. While I've got your ear, you should know that we are currently seeking a new work of art to feature. Would you like to help?
entries.s_5d4aadf9: Hello and welcome to the Bestine Museum. Would you like to purchase a schematic of our featured artwork?
entries.s_5bd69df6: What do you need me to do?
entries.s_5bc37444: It will be less than a day before we begin looking for another work of art that we'll feature here the museum.
entries.s_55e840b3: How will I find Klepa Laeel?
entries.s_519f72a3: There's still more than a day before the search for our next featured work of art begins.
entries.s_4f049f4e: In just a few hours we'll start the search for our next featured artwork.
entries.s_4f010def: It would seem that you have no room in your inventory to hold this datapad with my testimonial. I'm afraid you'll have to make some room before I can give it to you. Please speak to me again after you've done that.
entries.s_486f6: I'm asking for a modest... ahem... donation to the museum of 48,000 credits in exchange for the schematic. Oh, and I should warn you that some knowledge of advanced furniture production is required.
entries.s_47df8332: Yes, please. How much does one cost?
entries.s_463a0bda: Um... nevermind. I'm not interested in this.
entries.s_4443365b: I think I'll pick Boulo Siesi.
entries.s_400d075: Look for a small square near the Lucky Despot, and you'll find Vanvi Hotne in that area.
entries.s_3f115c47: Oh. That's too much for me. No thank you.
entries.s_39a4e8fa: Where can I find Boulo Siesi?
entries.s_3960dc15: Ah good. Which artist stood out as your favorite?
entries.s_375a5dc0:
Thank you for taking part in our contest. Check back when the event ends to see who won. 

Note that the event is 15 days from beginning to end and that the winning work of art will be on display for 30 days. That 30 days includes the 15 days between events as well as the 15 days of the next event. Thanks again!
entries.s_36cff745: Boulo Siesi is in Wayfar. She's usually by the cantina.
entries.s_35487421: We'll being looking in less than a week for the next work of art to be featured in the museum.
entries.s_2ecc437c: Where should I look for Kahfr Oladi?
entries.s_26c02ad3: I'm back for the testimonial for Sean Trenwell you had offered..
entries.s_23b5bcf: Giaal Itotr calls Mos Espa home, and you'll usually find him in front of the hotel.
entries.s_1aabf4f7: I hope you enjoy your visit. Take your time and wander through our collection. It's still not as large as I'd like, but I'm working on that.
entries.s_147d9a5b: What I ask is that you seek out the artists we are considering and learn of their work. Then return to me and let me know which of them you preferred. Three artists are involved. I can tell you where to find them if you'd like?
entries.s_1057c81b: Try Mos Eisley to find Kahfr Oladi. You'll probably find her near the bank.
entries.s_1042bed3: Here you are. I'm glad to help Mr. Trenwell and in this small way repay his generosity to the museum.
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (lilas_dinhint.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
